info.title: LangConnect API
info.description: A REST API for a RAG system using FastAPI and LangChain

get.description: Lists all available PGVector collections (name and UUID).

post.description: Creates a new PGVector collection by name with optional metadata.

get.description: Retrieves details (name and UUID) of a specific PGVector collection.

delete.description: Deletes a specific PGVector collection by name.

patch.description: Updates a specific PGVector collection's name and/or metadata.

post.description: Processes and indexes (adds) new document files with optional metadata.

schema.title: Response Documents Create Collections  Collection Id  Documents Post

get.description: Lists documents within a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Documents List Collections  Collection Id  Documents Get

post.description:
Step 1: Upload a document to storage and create a record in the database.
Does not perform chunking or embedding yet.

schema.title: Response Documents Upload Collections  Collection Id  Upload Post

post.description: Step 2: Process (chunk and embed) a previously uploaded document.

schema.title: Response Documents Process Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Process Post

post.description: Step 3: Perform embedding for a document that has already been chunked.

schema.title: Response Documents Embed Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Embed Post

get.description: Retrieves all chunks for a specific file (file_id) within a collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Chunks Collections  Collection Id  Documents  File Id  Chunks Get

delete.description: Deletes a specific document from a collection by its ID.

schema.title: Response Documents Delete Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Delete

post.description: Search for documents within a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Search Collections  Collection Id  Documents Search Post

post.description:
Advanced processing using PaddleOCR VLM. 
Best for documents where layout and high-quality OCR are critical.

schema.title: Response Documents Create Paddle Collections  Collection Id  Documents Paddle Post

post.description:
Directly converts a document to markdown using Docling.
Does not save to any collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Markdown Documents Markdown Post

get.description:
Get lightweight summaries of knowledge items (files) across all collections.
Optimized for card displays and rapid polling in the frontend.
Get global statistics for the user knowledge base.

post.description: Register a new Ollama instance for the user.

schema.title: Response List Ollama Instances Api Ollama Instances Get

get.description: Retrieve all models from all registered Ollama instances.

post.description: Set the active embedding model and its Ollama instance.

get.description: Get the currently selected embedding model and instance URL.
Check the health of all registered Ollama instances.

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique name of the collection.

CollectionCreate.title: CollectionCreate
CollectionCreate.description: Schema for creating a new collection.

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The unique identifier of the collection in PGVector.

CollectionResponse.title: CollectionResponse
CollectionResponse.description: Schema for representing a collection from PGVector.

CollectionUpdate.title: CollectionUpdate
CollectionUpdate.description: Schema for updating an existing collection.

url.title: Url
url.description: The base URL of the Ollama instance (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

name.title: Name
name.description: Optional friendly name for the instance
